description: This file is a shell script used for device configuration and management in an embedded system environment. It handles configuration fetching via HTTP, manages certificates, interacts with other system scripts, and performs network and device-specific operations such as triggering firmware updates and telemetry data collection.

methods.name: sendHttpRequestToServer
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request to download configuration data from the server, using either direct or Codebig connection based on configuration.

methods.name: getReceiverId
methods.description: Retrieves the receiver ID from a local data file.

methods.name: getChannelMapId
methods.description: Returns a static channel map ID.

methods.name: dropbearRecovery
methods.description: Restores the Dropbear SSH server if the process is not running.

methods.name: useDirectRequest
methods.description: Handles configuration fetch over a direct TCP connection.

methods.name: useCodebigRequest
methods.description: Handles configuration fetch over a Codebig connection with retries and fallback.

methods.name: processJsonResponse
methods.description: Parses the JSON response received from the server into a more readable configuration file.

methods.name: IsCodebigBlocked
methods.description: Checks if Codebig is currently blocked due to recent failures.

methods.name: get_Codebigconfig
methods.description: Determines the availability and enablement of Codebig connections based on system configuration.
